CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.Name = "Service Recovery", TEXT(Compensation__r.Payment_Currency__c), IF(RecordType.Name = "DotCom", Promotional_eVoucher_rule__r.Currency__c, IF(RecordType.Name = "Partner", Promotional_eVoucher_rule__r.Currency__c, IF(RecordType.Name = "Promotional" && ISBLANK(TEXT(Custom_Currency__c)), Promotional_eVoucher_rule__r.Currency__c, IF( (RecordType.Name = "Promotional" || RecordType.Name = "Eurostar Voucher" || RecordType.Name = "MITIE Voucher" || RecordType.Name = "Momentum Voucher" || RecordType.Name = "DotCom" || RecordType.Name = "Retiree Voucher") && NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Custom_Currency__c))), TEXT(Custom_Currency__c), "" ) ) ) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Final Amount requested by Boomi to Datacash - will change depending on the Record Type, and on the value of Custom_Currency__c
CustomField.label: Requested Currency
